title: The best (and worst) video game controller [The Resties]
description: Is the Gamecube controller brilliant or busted? The Resties rank the past 35 years of video game controllers in this fever dream of an episode. Then, the duo talks about NORCO, a new point-and-click adventure game set in a distant future Louisiana. Also, Speed Racer!
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (russ frushtick, chris plante)
